roleset.name: monomaniacal

example.name: both args
example.text: It seems that the higher class are obsessed with imitating and adopting western culture , in a sense it boosts their superiority complex .
example.arg: with imitating and adopting western culture

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, obsess.01. Corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1, marvel-31.3-8.
